ref: 5405 *jhurati2 ʻ wastes away ʼ. [~ juránt -- pres. part. RV. - &rcirclemacr S. jhuraṇu ʻ to be hurt (by blow, fall, &c.) ʼ whence caus. jhoraṇu; L. jhuraṇ ʻ to pine with grief ʼ; P. jhurnā ʻ to wither, grieve ʼ; N. jhurinu ʻ to become parched ʼ; Or. jhuribā ʻ to lament ʼ (or < *jhūrati); Mth. jhurab intr. ʻ to wither, parch, burn ʼ; OAw. jhuraï ʻ wastes away ʼ, H. jhurnā; G. jharvũ ʻ to pine away, languish ʼ (or < *jharati2); M. j̈hurṇẽ ʻ to waste away, drip, ooze ʼ. -- See *jhūrati.
